TopicTitle: OpenGL - Memory spike and unrelated crash on ship launch

Articles.Content:
Not sure why, but after a few flights the memory usage goes up and then I crash the next time I try to launch a ship.

[URL="http://pastebin.com/uNbUm1KC"]Here's the end of the log.[/URL]

It seems the usual change schenes memory leak. More than this, it seems that FAR (also on my install) throw some exception after a crash flight, and if you revert to launch and/or to SPH/VAB, the exception continue to occur. It's better to reload KSP after some flight/editor cycle.
